heading: HR00008
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE RAMMING AND SINKING OF A FILIPINO FISHING BOAT BY A CHINESE VESSEL AND THE CONSEQUENT ABANDONMENT OF THE HAPLESS TWENTY-TWO (22) FILIPINO FISHERMEN INSIDE THE PHILIPPINES’ EXCLUSIVE ECONOMIC ZONE IN RECTO BANK
